fullDescription.intro: This layer applies an update to the cost function based on input activity. Corresponds to the Keras Activity Regularization Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add an Activity Regularization layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Activity Regularization layer.
